tgt_original: yadīpsite vastuni tatra tatra tadanugā kartukāmatā ||
yatparīkṣye vastuni tatra tatra tadanugamupanidhyānasaṃniśritaṃ cittaikāgryaṃ ||
yatparīkṣya eva vastuni tatra tatra tadanugo dharmāṇā pravicayo yogavihitato vāyogavihitato vā naiva yogavihitato nāyogavihitataḥ ||  tatra manaskāraḥ kiṃkarmakaḥ |  cittā varjana karmakaḥ |
